  • Method Details

    • addCredentials

      boolean addCredentials(String username, int tokenLifetimeSeconds, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
      Adds credentials to a response.
      Parameters:
      username - The username.
      tokenLifetimeSeconds - The response token lifetime in seconds, if any.
      resp - The response to add credentials to.
      Returns:
      Were credentials supplied?
